V.: %1$s
BitcoinSpinner is a light-weight, secure, and user friendly Bitcoin client for Android, which is built on top of the BCCAPI.
BitcoinSpinner is not a Bitcoin bank. All your funds are secured by private keys in app-private storage on your Android device.

Please note that this is a beta release, use at your own risk.

Take a picture of it and/or print it out on Paper.

You are about to restore your wallet from a backup.\n\nThis is done by scanning a previously generated backup QR code or from a backup code on your clipboard.
Please wait while network fee is being calculated...
Network fee has been calculated to %s BTC.\n\nProceed?
A Bitcoin transaction fee of 0.0005 BTC is automatically added to your transaction.%1$sinfo...%2$s

By adding a small transaction fee your transaction is guaranteed to be propagated through the network and accepted by Bitcoin miners. The size of the transaction fee is typically 0.0005 BTC, but may be larger if your transaction is larger than 1000 bytes. If your transaction requires a fee larger than 0.0005 BTC you will get prompted to confirm whether you would like to send it.

You need to be connected to the internet.

Warning. You are about to export the private key that controls all the bitcoins managed by BitcoinSpinner.

Anyone who gains access to this key can take possession of the bitcoins it controls.

Do you want to continue?

Including miner fee of %1$s BTC this transaction will cost %2$s BTC, which you cannot afford.
A critical security vulnerability has been identified on Android, which makes private keys created or used by Android wallets vulnerable.\n\nYou are urged to take immediate action.

Install Mycelium Bitcoin Wallet and move your funds to one of its addresses. Mycelium Bitcoin Wallet is the successor of BitcoinSpinner, and will eventually replace it entirely.

OR

Continue using BitcoinSpinner:
 1. Move your funds to another wallet and wait for 6 confirmations
 2. Uninstall BitcoinSpinner
 3. Re-install BitcoinSpinner, this creates new strong keys
 4. Move funds back
